org.lemming.utils

Class LArrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lemming.utils.LArrays

  • public class LArrays
extends java.lang.Object
    This Lemming-Arrays (LArrays) wrapper class is used for manipulating arrays (e.g., sorting, searching) and for performing statistical analysis (e.g., average, standard deviation). It implements all of the Arrays methods, plus custom methods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LArrays()

      • linearRescale

        public static <T> T linearRescale(double[] a,
                                  double newMin,
                                  double newMax)
        Performs a linear re-scaling of the array a by converting the values in a to go from a range of (originalMin, originalMax) to a range of (newMin, newMax).

        The equation is:

        rescaled[i] = (a[i] - originalMin) * (newMax - newMin)/(originalMax - originalMin) + newMin

        Type Parameters:
        T - - data type
        Parameters:
        a - - array to process
        newMin - - the minimum value that the returned array will have
        newMax - - the maximum value that the returned array will have
        Returns:
        A new array that is re-scaled to be in the specified range

      • asList

        @SafeVarargs
